review: It has a very pretty interface, though I would prefer if Amazon Prime had its own app, instead of being all over the place.  Hopefully one day it will get more apps. And it's annoying to have to enter my pin to do screen mirroring.Overall I prefer the Roku. The fast forward thumbnail view on the Roku, the better 5G WiFi range. And it's just  And hopefully one day it will get more apps easier to use.
author: HeyRadar

review: I love the fire stick. Meet all our needs. Easy to set up. Would recommend it to anyone.
author: Alice G.

review: My wireless system is always buffering.  Makes watching any program impossible.  I wish there was a test that you could do BEFORE you bought this to see if it would work with the system you have in your home.
author: Gravman
